Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~harsha544 I see this is failing on power nodes. Did you observed this issue in x86_64 or in s390x builds. ?

Action.author: harrijk
Action.body: Although I haven't seen this issue on z Systems, I'm sure that adding additional small delays to the script.sh file wouldn't be much of an issue. Anything to help out the Power folks.

Action.author: sriramasharma
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu as ~harrijk mentioned, I also haven't seen this issue on some of my Power build and development nodes. Also, I think its occasionally seen on the sandbox system as well as the previous day's e2e tests you had run had passed. Adding sleep will just fix the stray occasional timing issue. Looks like a very low impact change. Just my 2 cents!
